import React from 'react'; import { useParams, Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import '../styles/ProductDetail.css'; const products = [ { id: 'E101', name: 'Wireless Headphones', category: 'Electronics', price: 299, image: 'https://images.pexels.com/photos/3945667/pexels-photo-3945667.jpeg?auto=compress&cs=tinysrgb&w=800', description: 'Premium wireless headphones with active noise cancellation and superior sound quality.', features: ['Active Noise Cancellation', '30-hour battery life', 'Bluetooth 5.0', 'Quick charge'], rating: 4.8, reviews: 324 }, { id: 'E102', name: 'Smartwatch', category: 'Electronics', price: 199, image: 'https://images.pexels.com/photos/437037/pexels-photo-437037.jpeg?auto=compress&cs=tinysrgb&w=800', description: 'Advanced smartwatch with health monitoring and fitness tracking capabilities.', features: ['Heart rate monitor', 'GPS tracking', 'Water resistant', '7-day battery'], rating: 4.6, reviews: 156 }, { id: 'E103', name: 'DSLR Camera', category: 'Electronics', price: 899, image: 'https://images.pexels.com/photos/90946/pexels-photo-90946.jpeg?auto=compress&cs=tinysrgb&w=800', description: 'Professional DSLR camera with high-resolution sensor and advanced features.', features: ['24MP sensor', '4K video', 'Dual card slots', 'Weather sealed'], rating: 4.9, reviews: 89 }, { id: 'C201', name: "Men's T-Shirt", category: 'Clothing', price: 29, image: 'https://images.pexels.com/photos/1040945/pexels-photo-1040945.jpeg?auto=compress&cs=tinysrgb&w=800', description: 'Comfortable cotton t-shirt perfect for casual wear.', features: ['100% cotton', 'Machine washable', 'Available in multiple colors', 'Regular fit'], rating: 4.3, reviews: 204 }, { id: 'C202', name: "Women's Jacket", category: 'Clothing', price: 89, image: 'https://images.pexels.com/photos/1040945/pexels-photo-1040945.jpeg?auto=compress&cs=tinysrgb&w=800', description: 'Stylish and warm jacket perfect for cold weather.', features: ['Water resistant', 'Insulated lining', 'Multiple pockets', 'Adjustable hood'], rating: 4.5, reviews: 112 }, { id: 'C203', name: 'Casual Sneakers', category: 'Clothing', price: 79, image: 'https://images.pexels.com/photos/1040945/pexels-photo-1040945.jpeg?auto=compress&cs=tinysrgb&w=800', description: 'Comfortable sneakers for everyday wear and light activities.', features: ['Cushioned sole', 'Breathable material', 'Durable construction', 'Lightweight'], rating: 4.6, reviews: 198 }, { id: 'H301', name: 'Mixer Grinder', category: 'Home Appliance', price: 149, image: 'https://images.pexels.com/photos/4226796/pexels-photo-4226796.jpeg?auto=compress&cs=tinysrgb&w=800', description: 'Powerful mixer grinder for all your kitchen needs.', features: ['750W motor', '3 jars included', 'Overload protection', '2-year warranty'], rating: 4.7, reviews: 142 }, { id: 'H302', name: 'Air Fryer', category: 'Home Appliance', price: 199, image: 'https://images.pexels.com/photos/4226796/pexels-photo-4226796.jpeg?auto=compress&cs=tinysrgb&w=800', description: 'Healthy cooking with little to no oil using advanced air circulation.', features: ['5L capacity', 'Digital controls', '8 preset modes', 'Easy to clean'], rating: 4.8, reviews: 226 }, { id: 'A401', name: 'Leather Wallet', category: 'Accessories', price: 49, image: 'https://images.pexels.com/photos/1040945/pexels-photo-1040945.jpeg?auto=compress&cs=tinysrgb&w=800', description: 'Premium leather wallet with multiple card slots and compartments.', features: ['Genuine leather', 'RFID blocking', '8 card slots', 'Coin pocket'], rating: 4.7, reviews: 142 }, { id: 'A402', name: 'Cotton Scarf', category: 'Accessories', price: 25, image: 'https://images.pexels.com/photos/1040945/pexels-photo-1040945.jpeg?auto=compress&cs=tinysrgb&w=800', description: 'Soft and comfortable cotton scarf for all seasons.', features: ['100% cotton', 'Lightweight', 'Machine washable', 'Multiple colors'], rating: 4.2, reviews: 88 }, { id: 'A403', name: 'Sunglasses', category: 'Accessories', price: 69, image: 'https://images.pexels.com/photos/1040945/pexels-photo-1040945.jpeg?auto=compress&cs=tinysrgb&w=800', description: 'Stylish sunglasses with UV protection and polarized lenses.', features: ['UV400 protection', 'Polarized lenses', 'Lightweight frame', 'Case included'], rating: 4.6, reviews: 173 } ]; const ProductDetail = () => { const { id } = useParams(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const product = products.find(p => p.id === id); if (!product) { return (

Product not found

Return to Home
); } const handleOrderNow = () => { navigate(`/order/${product.id}`); }; return (
← Back to Home
Product ID: {product.id} {product.category}

{product.name}

⭐ {product.rating} ({product.reviews} reviews)

${product.price}

Description

{product.description}

Features

    {product.features.map((feature, index) => (
  • {feature}
    • ))}
); }; export default ProductDetail;
